resources.string:
Contact Address 
IntelliGrape Software (P) Ltd 
SDF L-6, NSEZ 
Noida Phase 2
India
We develop robust web applications with Groovy and Grails

We work with some of the most cutting edge technologies open web has to offer. Building on best of breed technologies allows us to be fast, secure, and scalable. We invest quite a lot in exploring and learning new tools and technologies which helps us sharpen our skill-set and increase our productivity on an on-going basis. Knowledge sharing sessions, brown bag sessions, code camps are integral part of our culture.

We follow Agile Methodologies (combination of Scrum and XP principles) for application development. We have in-depth experience in implementing Agile in offshore development environment. Grails framework, Agile methodologies and our expertise in offshore development enable us to build an application with startling speed and robustness.

We broadly follow the following steps for application development. Comprehensive and detailed analysis of the business needs. Segregation of requirements into small modules/iterations as per priority. Initiate design concept and programming on iterations. Client feedback on completion of each iteration. Block wise testing of application to get the realtime feedback. Practising Scrum and XP principals such as re-factoring, pair programming to eliminate redundancies and optimise efficiency.

Few of our integral processes include Daily communication with almost all our clients Overlap of 4-6 hours with the client time zone , Small iterations of 1-6 weeks , Two way communication , Constant Feedback , Continuous Integration , Automated functional testing , Track of project status.
